Product_description: Innabella Microfiber colored tights are durable and neat on the legs. These tights come in a variety of fashion colors; and are great sellers. These tights can be used in performances or any occasion.

Made using 3D Spandex (where spandex is knitted in to every row, rather than the usual every other row), to give a better fit which will stretch evenly in all directions as you move. 3D elastane also makes the tights more durable and gives a beautifully soft, suede like finish.

They have a slight sheen which will make legs look polished and well dressed and, for the price, they offer an exceptionally soft feel coupled with a great fit. We think these opaque tights are super quality and value for money and are great for format events,schools, dance or daily wear.
We do have tips that really help maintain the tights so they last longer.
Tip #1 Always wash tights inside out, it keeps the tights from getting catches.
Tip #2 Hang tights to line dry, the dryer might ruin them.
Tip #3 Make sure your child's toe nails are cut, so the sharp edges don't tear the tights. (one of the main reasons why children have holes by the toes)

description: WIRE-FREE SOFT CUP DESIGN -Wirelessbra’s are best known for its comfort. They are Non Padded and Free of under wires, hooks and digging straps, making it more flexible, and are friendly to sensitive and sore breasts prone users., and by far, these are the easiest type of bras to care for.

SUPER SOFT &SEAMLESS CONSTRUCTION–Seamed bras are commonly the culprit of rashes and skin irritation. Our bra has a seamless construction for optimal easiness and total freedom from the discomfort of itchiness, skin discoloration, skin irritation, and rashes caused by seams.

COTTON AND LYCRA FABRIC – A composition of Cotton & Lycra ensures maximum convenience and absolute flexibility. Cotton Lycra fabric is recognized to be the best compositionfor a lightweight, breathable, moisture wicking, anti-bacterial non-shrink and sturdy garments, Perefct to wear with any kind of gown, dress, outfits.

Product_description: Bras are most times annoying, distressing, troublesome, wearisome and awkward especially for the first time wearers. Don’t make your first time experience frustrating and uncomforting.
Go with the Indistar bra that is specifically designed for beginners in mind to make your very first experience pleasant and worry-free.
The overall structure and composition of our bra will surely give nothing but 100% relaxed, fulfilling, untroubled, enjoyable, and satisfying first time bra experience for teenage girls.

title: Yellowberry Lola - Best comfort bra for girls and teens - great for a teen girls first bra
description: DESIGNED BY MEGAN: Internationally known for starting Yellowberry at 17 years old after a failed bra shopping trip with her younger sister. Megan and her team have now successfully created a brand resonating with girls all over the world and is revolutionizing the industry for girls and tweens.
LOOKING FOR TRADITION: Talk about an upgrade! Our Berries asked for a bra with an updated design and back clasp, this is our answer!

WAIT TILL YOU SEE IT: Perfect for indoor activities as well as outdoor adventures. With super style and great comfort, this bra meets and beats all that we have asked it to be. Quality 12 ounce cotton ensures no padding needed and full coverage.
CUSTOMER FAVORITE: Always in search of the softest cotton, this bra exceeds expectations! The back clasp wins the prize, and we are shouting about it from the mountain tops of Jackson Hole!

NO PADDING NEEDED! WE GUARANTEE IT: Complete coverage, fully-lined in the softest 12 ounce cotton available. Beautifully designed with only the best fabrics and specifications exclusively for girls and their growing, changing lifestyles.
Product_description: “Mary Margaret, you can't wear that!” I whispered to my 13-year-old sister in the dressing room as she tried on a leopard push-up bra that was as empty and as fake as the ad on the wall beside her.  “Yeah, um… I don't… I don't look like this…” she giggled. We came across the same thing at every store.

My younger sister, Caroline died in a parade accident when she was five, and Caroline’s spirit was captured in six mantras.  These mantras have since become the backbone of Yellowberry. Printed in some way on all of our products, our mantras represent the essence of Caroline, but also the foundation of the amazing girls in our Yellowberry community. Each mantra reminds our Berries to take the time to enjoy, explore, and change the world around her!

Whenever we photograph our products on one of our Berries, the photos are taken from the back. We believe in standing behind, and supporting her as she takes on the world focusing on what she can do and accomplish while in her Yellowberry, not how it looks to someone else. Yellowberry bras are about perfect fit, and how they make her feel from the inside out. That’s what is most important.

title: Yellowberry Bunches of Berries - Great Starter Bundle of Three Bras for Girls First and Best Tween and Teen Bra
description: DESIGNED BY MEGAN: Internationally known for starting Yellowberry at 17 years old after a failed bra shopping trip with her younger sister. Megan and her team have now successfully created a brand resonating with girls all over the world and is revolutionizing the industry for girls and tweens.

NO PADDING NEEDED! WE GUARANTEE IT: Complete coverage, fully-lined in the softest 6 ounce Pima Cotton available. Beautifully designed with only the best fabrics and specifications exclusively for girls and their growing, changing lifestyles.
MOMS WILL LOVE US: Ideally designed for girls to promote their first bra experience in our signature Yellowberry. Our quintessential first bra.
ULTIMATE FIRST BRA: Yellowberry cultivates a sense of confidence and empowerment by designing the very best bras and products for girls of all ages.
THREE BRA BUNDLE: This bundle includes three Pipit bras with fully covered edges and lovely construction.
Product_description: “Mary Margaret, you can't wear that!” I whispered to my 13-year-old sister in the dressing room as she tried on a leopard push-up bra that was as empty and as fake as the ad on the wall beside her.  “Yeah, um… I don't… I don't look like this…” she giggled. We came across the same thing at every store.

My younger sister, Caroline died in a parade accident when she was five, and Caroline’s spirit was captured in six mantras.  These mantras have since become the backbone of Yellowberry. Printed in some way on all of our products, our mantras represent the essence of Caroline, but also the foundation of the amazing girls in our Yellowberry community. Each mantra reminds our Berries to take the time to enjoy, explore, and change the world around her!

Whenever we photograph our products on one of our Berries, the photos are taken from the back. We believe in standing behind, and supporting her as she takes on the world focusing on what she can do and accomplish while in her Yellowberry, not how it looks to someone else. Yellowberry bras are about perfect fit, and how they make her feel from the inside out. That’s what is most important.

We are named for the coldest, most unforgiving side of a mountain. We have helped explorers reach the most unfathomable heights of the Himalayas. But The North Face legend begins, ironically, on a beach. More precisely, San Francisco's North Beach neighborhood, at an altitude of only 150 feet above sea level. It was here in 1966 that two hiking enthusiasts resolved to follow their passions and founded a small mountaineering retail store. From the beginning, the brand committed to serving all those who desired to explore and to serving our natural wild lands by helping to conserve them. At our core, we believe exploration creates an indelible bond with the outdoors, inspiring people to protect our land and pass these beliefs down to the next generation.

Product_description: Kidorable Green Fairy All-Weather Raincoats are available in sizes 1T, 2T, 3T, 4T, 4/5, 5/6, and 6/7. Like all Kidorable coats, they have a fun, comfy polyester lining and hood. To complete the outfit, get a matching Kidorable Fairy umbrella, boots, backpack, knitwear and more! Most Kidorable products are designed for children aged 2-6. Many of our products are available for babies, and children as old as 11. Kidorable delights both children and the adults who love them by transforming everyday, functional kids' accessories into objects that excite their imaginations and enrich their lives at play. Find the gear your kids will actually beg to wear. Raincoats, Rain Boots, Umbrellas, Backpacks, Hooded Towels, Hanger Sets, Knit Gloves, Hats, and Scarves, and more. Here you’ll find styles to spark any kid’s imagination—Shark, Dinosaur, Lucky Cat, Ladybug, Butterfly, Frog, and Lotus for animal and nature lovers. Pirate, Fairy, Mermaid, Ballerina, Fireman, Space Hero, Dragon Knight and Fireman for kids who dream big. Plus Dora the Explorer and SpongeBob SquarePants for kids who want to be their favorite characters. We believe in the power of imagination to make everyday families happier. Because a lot is at stake. More and more, children are forgetting how to create, to think, to explore, to connect. Over-scheduled, under-engaged, dulled by TV and video games, our kids are less and less able to amuse themselves, solve their own problems, or tell the difference between the character in the movie and the one trying to sell them cereal on TV. It's time someone said there's a better way. Someone like us. Someone like you. It's time that children and the adults who love them rely more on human beings for connection and guidance and entertainment instead of screens with shiny lights and buttons. It's easy. All it takes is someone who cares. And a little imagination. Won't you join us?

title: Yellowberry Tuli - Best Comfort Bra for Girls and Teens - Great for a Tween Girls First Bra
description: DESIGNED BY MEGAN: Internationally known for starting Yellowberry at 17 years old after a failed bra shopping trip with her younger sister. Megan and her team have now successfully created a brand resonating with girls all over the world and is revolutionizing the industry for girls and tweens
YOU ASKED WE DELIVERED: First bras needed an update and this is our answer. Taking girls not only from the first bra, but to the second and the third too.

EVERYDAY FIT: Perfect for indoor activities as well as outdoor adventures. With a bit of style and great comfort this bra meets and beats all that we have asked it to be. Quality 12 ounce cotton ensures no padding needed and full coverage.
CUSTOMER FAVORITE: Always in search of the softest 12 ounce cotton, this bra exceeds expectations! Covered edges, and darling design that Moms and daughters love.

NO PADDING NEEDED! WE GUARANTEE IT: Complete coverage, fully-lined in the softest 12 ounce cotton available. Beautifully designed with only the best fabrics and specifications exclusively for girls and their growing, changing lifestyles.
Product_description: “Mary Margaret, you can't wear that!” I whispered to my 13-year-old sister in the dressing room as she tried on a leopard push-up bra that was as empty and as fake as the ad on the wall beside her.  “Yeah, um… I don't… I don't look like this…” she giggled. We came across the same thing at every store.

My younger sister, Caroline died in a parade accident when she was five, and Caroline’s spirit was captured in six mantras.  These mantras have since become the backbone of Yellowberry. Printed in some way on all of our products, our mantras represent the essence of Caroline, but also the foundation of the amazing girls in our Yellowberry community. Each mantra reminds our Berries to take the time to enjoy, explore, and change the world around her!

Whenever we photograph our products on one of our Berries, the photos are taken from the back. We believe in standing behind, and supporting her as she takes on the world focusing on what she can do and accomplish while in her Yellowberry, not how it looks to someone else. Yellowberry bras are about perfect fit, and how they make her feel from the inside out. That’s what is most important.

description: 2-Piece matching rainwear set includes rain slicker and matching umbrella featuring Shopkins characters D’lish Donut, Apple Blossom and Poppy Corn

Product_description: Little girls will actually look forward to rainy days thanks to this adorable 2-piece Shopkins rainwear set. The eye-catching rain slicker and matching umbrella feature colorful artwork of Shopkins famous characters D’lish Donut, Apple Blossom and Poppy Corn. Designed for toddler and little girls and available in different sizes for girls ages 2-7, the vibrant pink and purple rain slicker is moisture and humidity-resistant. Pink snap buttons are easy for children to fasten and unfasten. The thin but durable vinyl slicker fits easily over her clothing to keep her comfy, and an adjustable elastic hood helps keep the rain out. A matching pink and purple 8-panel umbrella features alternating Shopkins characters and Team Shopkins bunting. HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN: Everything from the stitching to the hem lining is carefully done to create the most durable one piece pajamas for girls. The footed sleepers are also machine wash safe, so you can confidently launder them without the risk of losing shape or color.

footed PJs serve up eye-catching cuteness with their beautiful color and fun prints that include everything from

to toasty snugness to help them drift off to dreamland. And you’ll love just how easy it is to get your cutie pie into
these footed pajamas! They come with a full body zip closure to make getting in and out of the jammies a breeze.

title: Girls Microfiber Soft Opaque Solid Colored Footed Tights (8-10, Fruit Green)
description: MATERIAL: 85% Nylon, 15% Spandex, 50Den Semi Opaque, Nilit nylon 6.6. brings super soft touch
CRAFTWORK: 3D spandex knitting technology makes the tights stretchable in all directions and have a better fitting
COLOR: Incredibly with 17 different colors in option; SIZE: Girls sizes from age 2, up to age 13
LEG ELEGANT tights are sold exclusively by Ellen Lee Hosiery, any other sellers to sell LEG ELEGANT brand are fake products.
Product_description: Innabella Microfiber colored tights are durable and neat on the legs. These tights come in a variety of fashion colors; and are great sellers. These tights can be used in performances or any occasion.

Made using 3D Spandex (where spandex is knitted in to every row, rather than the usual every other row), to give a better fit which will stretch evenly in all directions as you move. 3D elastane also makes the tights more durable and gives a beautifully soft, suede like finish.

They have a slight sheen which will make legs look polished and well dressed and, for the price, they offer an exceptionally soft feel coupled with a great fit. We think these opaque tights are super quality and value for money and are great for format events,schools, dance or daily wear.
We do have tips that really help maintain the tights so they last longer.
Tip #1 Always wash tights inside out, it keeps the tights from getting catches.
Tip #2 Hang tights to line dry, the dryer might ruin them.
Tip #3 Make sure your child's toe nails are cut, so the sharp edges don't tear the tights. (one of the main reasons why children have holes by the toes)

title: ScratchSleeves | Little Girls' Stay-On Scratch Mitts | Pink
description: Effective scratch mittens designed specifically for older babies and children, available in sizes from birth to 8 years.
Cardigan design ensures ScratchSleeves stay firmly in place and makes them quick and easy for carers to put on.
Natural silk mitts protect delicate skin from even the most vigorous scratching. Loose fitting, 100% cotton sleeves ensure kids stay cool and sensitive skin is not irritated.
Great for little ones who scratch at itchy eczema (atopic dermatitis), pull their hair, suck their thumbs, bite their nails, pick at scabs and much more.
Can be used day or night and worn over or under regular clothing. Machine washable (wash wash) using wool safe detergent. Can be tumble-dried on medium.
Product_description: Simple and effective solution for scratchy little ones. The unique double layer mitts with a smooth silk outer layer ensure that damage caused by scratching and rubbing is minimized. The cardigan design ensures that ScratchSleeves are easy to put on and stay firmly in place without the need for fiddly fastening, which can also be used for scratching. Loose fitting sleeves ensure that toddlers and kids stay cool and sensitive skin on hands, wrists and arms is not irritated.

Originally designed for babies and kids with eczema, ScratchSleeves are also effective for all sorts of scratching and irritation including chicken pox, cradle cap, ear pulling, overly enthusiastic thumb sucking, nail-biting and even hair pulling.

"For the first time in a very long time, my 4 year old granddaughter has been able to enjoy a full night's sleep without scratching. You can imagine how happy and relieved her parents are to see how much better her skin is after just one night using ScratchSleeves. A night without scratching = a full night's sleep for everyone" - Vanessa.
